entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. Temperature falling to minus 6 this morning then rising.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 6 this morning then rising. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then periods of light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
